summary: Implementation plan for Chapter 6 of NanoBrain development framework. Covers 5 tasks: TubulinPPMModel for protein structure encoding, TripletResonanceCascade for nested resonance bands, CellularAutomatonEngine for parallel computing simulation, NeuronTimeCrystalMapper for complete neuron mapping, and FilamentCommunicator for hidden pre-spike signaling. Creates new nanobrain_singularity.h/.cpp module and singularity_demo.cpp demonstration program.
